title: Using old League Files in the New Client
body:
I just got the new client because it made me, and I can't figure out how to use my league files. It seems like it wants to download League again and I can't find anything about how to make it update my files.

tl;dr I have league installed but the new client wants to install it again

replies.body: If you're looking at the new client update, that needs to be done. We transitioned recently and you won't be able to use the outdated client any longer.
